dt.t: In the spring, two young grizzly bears, just out of a winter's sleep, … knocked over a half-dozen commercial {wi}beehives{/wi} and fed on the honey and larvae within.

dt: {bc}something resembling a hive for bees: such as

dt.t: … a {wi}beehive{/wi} of growling trucks, riverboats laden with supplies, helicopters and airplanes buzzing overhead …

dt: {bc}a woman's hairstyle that is conical in shape

dt.t: She is about sixty-five with hair white as spun sugar, piled up in a {wi}beehive{/wi} hairdo that has been out of style for twenty years.

shortdef: something resembling a hive for bees: such as

dt: {bc}an arched oven used especially for baking food and formerly for coking coal

shortdef: an arched oven used especially for baking food and formerly for coking coal
